info.title: Face API
info.description: An API for face detection, verification, and identification.

post.description: Given query face's faceId, find the similar-looking faces from a faceId array or a faceListId.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for Find Similar.

200.description: A successful call returns an array of the most similar faces represented in faceId if the input parameter is faceIds or persistedFaceId if the input parameter is faceListId.

post.description: Divide candidate faces into groups based on face similarity.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for grouping.

200.description: A successful call returns one or more groups of similar faces (rank by group size) and a messyGroup.

post.description: Identify unknown faces from a person group.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for identify operation.

200.description: A successful call returns the identified candidate person(s) for each query face.

post.description: Verify whether two faces belong to a same person or whether one face belongs to a person.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for verify operation.

200.description: A successful call returns the verification result.

post.description: Create a new person in a specified person group.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the target person group to create the person.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for creating new person.

200.description: A successful call returns a new personId created.

get.description: List all persons in a person group, and retrieve person information (including personId, name, userData and persistedFaceIds of registered faces of the person).

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: personGroupId of the target person group.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Starting person id to return (used to list a range of persons).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of persons to return starting with the person id indicated by the 'start' parameter.

200.description: A successful call returns an array of person information that belong to the person group.

delete.description: Delete an existing person from a person group. Persisted face images of the person will also be deleted.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: The target personId to delete.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

get.description: Retrieve a person's information, including registered persisted faces, name and userData.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Specifying the target person.

200.description: A successful call returns the person's information.

patch.description: Update name or userData of a person.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: personId of the target person.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body  for person update operation.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

delete.description: Delete a face from a person. Relative image for the persisted face will also be deleted.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Specifying the person that the target persisted face belong to.

parameters.name: persistedFaceId
parameters.description: The persisted face to remove.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

get.description: Retrieve information about a persisted face (specified by persistedFaceId, personId and its belonging personGroupId).

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Specifying the target person that the face belongs to.

parameters.name: persistedFaceId
parameters.description: The persistedFaceId of the target persisted face of the person.

200.description: A successful call returns target persisted face's information (persistedFaceId and userData).

patch.description: Update a person persisted face's userData field.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: personId of the target person.

parameters.name: persistedFaceId
parameters.description: persistedFaceId of target face, which is persisted and will not expire.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for updating persisted face.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

put.description: Create a new person group with specified personGroupId, name and user-provided userData.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: User-provided personGroupId as a string.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for creating new person group.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

delete.description: Delete an existing person group. Persisted face images of all people in the person group will also be deleted.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: The personGroupId of the person group to be deleted.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

get.description: Retrieve the information of a person group, including its name and userData.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: personGroupId of the target person group.

200.description: A successful call returns the person group's information.

patch.description: Update an existing person group's display name and userData. The properties which does not appear in request body will not be updated.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: personGroupId of the person group to be updated.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for updating person group.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

get.description: Retrieve the training status of a person group (completed or ongoing).

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: personGroupId of target person group.

200.description: A successful call returns the person group's training status.

get.description: List person groups and their information.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: List person groups from the least personGroupId greater than the "start".

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The number of person groups to list.

200.description: A successful call returns an array of person groups and their information.

post.description: Queue a person group training task, the training task may not be started immediately.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Target person group to be trained.

202.description: The training task was queued successfully.

put.description: Create an empty face list. Up to 64 face lists are allowed to exist in one subscription.

parameters.name: faceListId
parameters.description: Id referencing a particular face list.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for creating a face list.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

parameters.name: faceListId
parameters.description: Id referencing a Face List.

200.description: A successful call returns the face list's information.

patch.description: Update information of a face list.

parameters.name: faceListId
parameters.description: Id referencing a Face List.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for updating a face list.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

delete.description: Delete an existing face list according to faceListId. Persisted face images in the face list will also be deleted.

parameters.name: faceListId
parameters.description: Id referencing a Face List.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

get.description: Retrieve information about all existing face lists. Only faceListId, name and userData will be returned.

200.description: A successful call returns an array of faceList.

delete.description: Delete an existing face from a face list (given by a persisitedFaceId and a faceListId). Persisted image related to the face will also be deleted.

parameters.name: faceListId
parameters.description: faceListId of an existing face list.

parameters.name: persistedFaceId
parameters.description: persistedFaceId of an existing face.

200.description: A successful call returns an empty response body.

post.description: Add a representative face to a person for identification. The input face is specified as an image with a targetFace rectangle.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Target person that the face is added to.

parameters.name: userData
parameters.description: User-specified data about the target face to add for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

200.description: A successful call returns the new persistedFaceId.

post.description: Detect human faces in an image and returns face locations, and optionally with faceIds, landmarks, and attributes.

parameters.name: returnFaceId
parameters.description: A value indicating whether the operation should return faceIds of detected faces.

parameters.name: returnFaceLandmarks
parameters.description: A value indicating whether the operation should return landmarks of the detected faces.

200.description: A successful call returns an array of face entries ranked by face rectangle size in descendingorder. An empty response indicates no faces detected.

post.description: Add a face to a face list. The input face is specified as an image with a targetFace rectangle. It returns a persistedFaceId representing the added face, and persistedFaceId will not expire.

parameters.name: faceListId
parameters.description: Id referencing a Face List.

parameters.name: userData
parameters.description: User-specified data about the face list for any purpose. The  maximum length is 1KB.

200.description: A successful call returns a new persistedFaceId.

post.description: Verify whether two faces belong to a same person. Compares a face Id with a Person Id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request body for verifying two faces in a person group

200.description: A successful call returns the verification result.

post.description: Detect human faces in an image and returns face locations, and optionally with faceIds, landmarks, and attributes.

parameters.name: returnFaceId
parameters.description: A value indicating whether the operation should return faceIds of detected faces.

parameters.name: returnFaceLandmarks
parameters.description: A value indicating whether the operation should return landmarks of the detected faces.

200.description: A successful call returns an array of face entries ranked by face rectangle size in descendingorder. An empty response indicates no faces detected.

post.description: Add a representative face to a person for identification. The input face is specified as an image with a targetFace rectangle.

parameters.name: personGroupId
parameters.description: Specifying the person group containing the target person.

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Target person that the face is added to.

parameters.name: userData
parameters.description: User-specified data about the target face to add for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

200.description: A successful call returns the new persistedFaceId.

post.description: Add a face to a face list. The input face is specified as an image with a targetFace rectangle. It returns a persistedFaceId representing the added face, and persistedFaceId will not expire.

parameters.name: faceListId
parameters.description: Id referencing a Face List.

parameters.name: userData
parameters.description: User-specified data about the face list for any purpose. The  maximum length is 1KB.

200.description: A successful call returns a new persistedFaceId.

APIError.description: Error information returned by the API

persistedFaceId.description: persistedFaceId of candidate face when find by faceListId. persistedFaceId in face list is persisted and will not expire. As showed in below response

FaceRectangle.description: A rectangle within which a face can be found

width.description: The width of the rectangle, in pixels.

height.description: The height of the rectangle, in pixels.

left.description: The distance from the left edge if the image to the left edge of the rectangle, in pixels.

top.description: The distance from the top edge if the image to the top edge of the rectangle, in pixels.

FaceLandmarks.description: A collection of 27-point face landmarks pointing to the important positions of face components.

glasses.description: Glasses type if any of the face.

HeadPoseProperties.description: Properties indicating head pose of the face.

EmotionProperties.description: Properties describing facial emotion in form of confidence ranging from 0 to 1.

bald.description: A number describing confidence level of whether the person is bald.

invisible.description: A boolean value describing whether the hair is visible in the image.

HairColors.description: An array of candidate colors and confidence level in the presence of each.

MakeupProperties.description: Properties describing present makeups on a given face.

eyeMakeup.description: A boolean value describing whether eye makeup is present on a face.

lipMakeup.description: A boolean value describing whether lip makeup is present on a face.

OcclusionProperties.description: Properties describing occulusions on a given face.

foreheadOccluded.description: A boolean value indicating whether forehead is occluded.

eyeOccluded.description: A boolean value indicating whether eyes are occluded.

mouthOccluded.description: A boolean value indicating whether the mouth is occluded.

AccessoryProperties.description: Properties describing any accessories on a given face.

AccessoryItem.description: Accessory item and corresponding confidence level.

BlurProperties.description: Properties describing any presence of blur within the image.

blurLevel.description: An enum value indicating level of blurriness.

value.description: A number indicating level of blurriness ranging from 0 to 1.

ExposureProperties.description: Properties describing exposure level of the image.

exposureLevel.description: An enum value indicating level of exposure.

value.description: A number indicating level of exposure level ranging from 0 to 1. [0, 0.25) is under exposure. [0.25, 0.75) is good exposure. [0.75, 1] is over exposure.

NoiseProperties.description: Properties describing noise level of the image.

noiseLevel.description: An enum value indicating level of noise.

value.description: A number indicating level of noise level ranging from 0 to 1. [0, 0.25) is under exposure. [0.25, 0.75) is good exposure. [0.75, 1] is over exposure. [0, 0.3) is low noise level. [0.3, 0.7) is medium noise level. [0.7, 1] is high noise level.

FindSimilarRequest.description: Request body for find similar operation.

faceId.description: FaceId of the query face. User needs to call Face - Detect first to get a valid faceId. Note that this faceId is not persisted and will expire 24 hours after the detection call

faceListId.description: An existing user-specified unique candidate face list, created in Face List - Create a Face List. Face list contains a set of persistedFaceIds which are persisted and will never expire. Parameter faceListId and faceIds should not be provided at the same time

faceIds.description: An array of candidate faceIds. All of them are created by Face - Detect and the faceIds will expire 24 hours after the detection call.

maxNumOfCandidatesReturned.description: The number of top similar faces returned. The valid range is [1, 1000].

mode.description: Similar face searching mode. It can be "matchPerson" or "matchFace".

SimilarFaceResult.description: Response body for find similar face operation.

faceId.description: faceId of candidate face when find by faceIds. faceId is created by Face - Detect and will expire 24 hours after the detection call

persistedFaceId.description: persistedFaceId of candidate face when find by faceListId. persistedFaceId in face list is persisted and will not expire. As showed in below response

faceIds.description: Array of candidate faceId created by Face - Detect. The maximum is 1000 faces

GroupResponse.description: An array of face groups based on face similarity.

groups.description: A partition of the original faces based on face similarity. Groups are ranked by number of faces

messyGroup.description: Face ids array of faces that cannot find any similar faces from original faces.

IdentifyRequest.description: Request body for identify face operation.

personGroupId.description: personGroupId of the target person group, created by PersonGroups.Create

faceIds.description: Array of candidate faceId created by Face - Detect.

maxNumOfCandidatesReturned.description: The number of top similar faces returned.

IdentifyResultItem.description: Response body for identify face operation.

IdentifyResultCandidate.description: All possible faces that may qualify.

faceId.description: faceId the face, comes from Face - Detect

personId.description: Specify a certain person in a person group. personId is created in Persons.Create.

personGroupId.description: Using existing personGroupId and personId for fast loading a specified person. personGroupId is created in Person Groups.Create.

faceId1.description: faceId of the first face, comes from Face - Detect

faceId2.description: faceId of the second face, comes from Face - Detect

isIdentical.description: True if the two faces belong to the same person or the face belongs to the person, otherwise false.

CreateFaceListRequest.description: Request to create a face list.

name.description: Name of the face list, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data for the face list. Length should not exceed 16KB.

faceListId.description: faceListId of the target face list.

userData.description: User-provided data attached to this face list.

persistedFaces.description: Persisted faces within the face list.

FaceListResults.description: An array of face list results.

CreatePersonGroupRequest.description: Request to create a person group.

name.description: Name of the face list, maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional user defined data for the face list. Length should not exceed 16KB.

personGroupId.description: faceListId of the target face list.

userData.description: User-provided data attached to this face list.

CreatePersonRequest.description: Request to create a person object.

name.description: Display name of the target person. The maximum length is 128.

userData.description: Optional fields for user-provided data attached to a person. Size limit is 16KB.

personId.description: personID of the new created person.
personId of the target face list.

persistedFaceIds.description: persistedFaceIds of registered faces in the person. These persistedFaceIds are returned from Person - Add a Person Face, and will not expire.

userData.description: User-provided data attached to this person.

persistedFaceId.description: The persistedFaceId of the target face, which is persisted and will not expire. Different from faceId created by Face - Detect and will expire in 24 hours after the detection call.

userData.description: User-provided data attached to the face.

UpdatePersonFaceDataRequest.description: Request to update person face data.

userData.description: User-provided data attached to the face. The size limit is 1KB

status.description: Training status: notstarted, running, succeeded, failed. If the training process is waiting to perform, the status is notstarted. If the training is ongoing, the status is running. Status succeed means this person group is ready for Face - Identify. Status failed is often caused by no person or no persisted face exist in the person group

createdDateTime.description: A combined UTC date and time string that describes person group created time.

lastActionDateTime.description: Person group last modify time in the UTC, could be null value when the person group is not successfully trained.

message.description: Show failure message when training failed (omitted when training succeed).

ConfidenceProperty.description: A number ranging from 0 to 1 indicating a level of confidence associated with a property.

returnFaceAttributes.name: returnFaceAttributes
returnFaceAttributes.description: Analyze and return the one or more specified face attributes in the comma-separated string like "returnFaceAttributes=age,gender". Supported face attributes include age, gender, headPose, smile, facialHair, glasses and emotion. Note that each face attribute analysis has additional computational and time cost.

targetFace.name: targetFace
targetFace.description: A face rectangle to specify the target face to be added to a person in the format of "targetFace=left,top,width,height". E.g. "targetFace=10,10,100,100". If there is more than one face in the image, targetFace is required to specify which face to add. No targetFace means there is only one face detected in the entire image.
